title: Tech May Get In The Way Of Good Culture Shock While Studying Abroad
teaser: A record number of Americans are studying abroad. Educators say that's good, as it promotes better cross-cultural understanding. But many in the field worry the influx of technology and social media may be hampering students' ability to fully immerse themselves abroad.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
